TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UrlIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class UrlIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class UrlIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: 定義程式碼來源 URL 的識別權限。

span.span: Defines the identity permission for the URL from which the code originates.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被視為完整的 URL，包括通訊協定 （HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP） 和檔案。The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file. 比方說，http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm是完整的 URL。For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL. Url 可以完全相符或者中最後一個位置中，萬用字元，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*。URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*. Url 也可以包含萬用字元 ("\*") 在點分隔符號的前置詞。URLs can also contain a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，URL 名稱字串http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/子集 http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ 和 http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/。For example, the URL name string http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ is a subset of http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ and http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不會使用身分識別的權限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，於身分識別的權限的需求會生效，即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但是，如果組件不符合要求的準則識別權限的要求即會失敗。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，身分識別的權限的要求是沒有效果，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 也就是身分識別的要求一定成功，不論身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會將身分識別的權限的特殊案例的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限的要求是有效的即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但是，如果組件不符合要求的準則識別權限的要求即會失敗。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，身分識別的權限的要求是沒有效果，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會將身分識別的權限的特殊案例的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET Framework 的版本中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，您可以使用方法，以防止意外存取系統資源受信任的程式碼。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 現已淘汰，並存取資源現在僅取決於授與的權限集合組件。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制檔案的存取權，您必須在沙箱中執行部分信任程式碼，並將指派給它的權限的程式碼可以存取的資源。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 如需在沙箱中執行的應用程式的資訊，請參閱[如何： 執行部分信任程式碼在沙箱中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md). > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有的使用權限狀態值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，身分識別的權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 和更新版本的版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface.

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立完全限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`權限。Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有的使用權限狀態值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，身分識別的權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 和更新版本的版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是身分識別的要求一定成功，不論身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限的要求是有效的即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但是，如果組件不符合要求的準則識別權限的要求即會失敗。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，身分識別的權限的要求是沒有效果，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會將身分識別的權限的特殊案例的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用建構函式。The following example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CPP/urlidentity.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CS/urlidentity.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/VB/urlidentity.vb#7)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，以表示由 所描述的 URL 識別。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to represent the URL identity described by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被視為完整的 URL，包括通訊協定 (HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP) 和檔案，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/. Url 可以完全相符或者中最後一個位置中，萬用字元，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*。URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*. Url 也可以包含萬用字元 ("\*") 在點分隔符號的前置詞。URLs can also contain a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，URL 名稱字串http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/子集 http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ 和 http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/。For example, the URL name string http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ is a subset of http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ and http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/. > [!NOTE] > 開始使用.NET Framework 2.0 版中，基於效能考量，無效的 URL 並不會的建立新的類別執行個體時的引數例外狀況。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, for performance reasons, an invalid URL does not cause an argument exception at the time the new class instance is created. 其中一個 （Union、 Intersect 或 IsSubsetOf） 的設定作業執行時，會發生引數例外狀況。The argument exception will occur when one of the set operations (Union, Intersect, or IsSubsetOf) is executed. 上的權限的原因要求安全性基礎結構所呼叫。A demand on the permission causes to be called by the security infrastructure. 需求會因為引數例外狀況，導致失敗所擲回。The demand will fail because of the argument exception, resulting in a being thrown. 在此情況下，原始都不會顯示例外狀況。In this case, the original exception will not be seen. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用建構函式。The following example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CPP/urlidentity.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CS/urlidentity.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/VB/urlidentity.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明兩者所共同描述 Url 的存取權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes access to the URLs they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 比方說，交集的權限，表示存取權http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm和代表存取權的權限http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\* 是代表存取權的權限http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。For example, the intersection of a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm and a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\* is a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm. 支援設定作業 (， ，和) 只有當目前的權限等於指定的權限物件，或當其中一個權限時，使用萬用字元 ("\*")。 supports set operations (, , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission object or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("\*").

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
-or-

exception.span: Url 屬性不是有效的 URL。

span.span: The Url property is not a valid URL.

Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的權限識別完全包含在指定的權限的 URL 存取，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission identifies access to a URL that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，代表權限的權限http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm是代表存取權的權限的子集http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\*。For example, a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a subset of a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\*. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 支援設定作業 (， ，和) 只有當目前的權限等於所指定權限，或當其中一個權限時，使用萬用字元 ("\*")。 supports set operations (, , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("\*").

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
-or-

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果方法是代表 URL 表示目前的使用權限的存取權，以及存取的 URL 表示的指定權限的權限。The result of a call to the method is a permission that represents access to the URL as represented by the current permission, as well as access to the URL as represented by the specified permission. 類別支援設定作業， ，和) 只有目前的使用權限是否等於指定的權限，或當其中一個權限使用萬用字元運算子 ("\*")，而卻的子集其他。The class supports set operations , , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission, or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("\*") and one is a subset of the other.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Url : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 URL，代表網際網路程式碼的身分識別。

span.span: Gets or sets a URL representing the identity of Internet code.

value.span: 代表網際網路程式碼身分識別的 URL。

span.span: A URL representing the identity of Internet code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被視為完整的 URL，包括通訊協定 (HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP) 和檔案，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/. Url 可以完全相符或者中最後一個位置中，萬用字元，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*。URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*.

exception.span: 無法擷取此 URL，因為它具有模稜兩可的身分識別。

span.span: The URL cannot be retrieved because it has an ambiguous identity.
